patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-operator
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mysql-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mysql-operator
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: mysql-operator
      containers:
      - name: operator
        image: olegim89/mysql-operator:v0.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: product-composite
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: product-composite
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: product-composite
        version: v2
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: comp
        image: hands-on/product-composite-service:v2
        env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: docker,prod
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 200Mi
            cpu: 100m
          limits:
            memory: 400Mi
            cpu: 500m
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: captureorder
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: captureorder
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: captureorder
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: captureorder
        image: akschallenge97396acr.azurecr.io/captureorder:cf1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            port: 8080
            path: /healthz
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            port: 8080
            path: /healthz
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 64Mi
            cpu: 100m
          limits:
            memory: 128Mi
            cpu: 500m
        env:
        - name: TEAMNAME
          value: team-azch
        - name: MONGOHOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: mongodb
              key: mongoHost
        - name: MONGOUSER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: mongodb
              key: mongoUser
        - name: MONGOPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: mongodb
              key: mongoPassword
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: captureorder
spec:

            path: /healthz

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: failed-pod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: motor
    image: busybox:stable
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 16Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 16Mi
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    args:
    - echo "This is failed phase"; exit 1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      runAsNonRoot: true
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: salesforce-connector
  name: salesforce-connector
  namespace: gfw
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: salesforce-connector
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: salesforce-connector
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: In
                values:
                - gfw
      containers:
      - args:
        - start
        env:
        - name: PORT
          value: '9500'
        - name: LOGGER_TYPE
          value: console
        - name: LOGGER_LEVEL
          value: debug
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: staging
        - name: NODE_PATH
          value: app/src
        - name: MICROSERVICE_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MICROSERVICE_TOKEN
              name: mssecrets
        - name: GATEWAY_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GATEWAY_URL
              name: mssecrets
        - name: FASTLY_ENABLED
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: FASTLY_ENABLED
              name: mssecrets
        - name: FASTLY_APIKEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: FASTLY_APIKEY
              name: mssecrets
              optional: true
        - name: FASTLY_SERVICEID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: FASTLY_SERVICEID
              name: mssecrets
              optional: true
        - name: SALESFORCE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SALESFORCE_URL
              name: mssecrets
        - name: SALESFORCE_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SALESFORCE_USERNAME
              name: mssecrets
        - name: SALESFORCE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SALESFORCE_PASSWORD
              name: mssecrets
        image: gfwdockerhub/salesforce-connector:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthcheck
            port: 9500
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 15
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: salesforce-connector
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9500
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthcheck
            port: 9500
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 15
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '1'
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 350m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext: {}

            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: In
                values:
                - gfw
      containers:
      - args:
        - start
        env:
        - name: PORT
          value: '9500'
        - name: LOGGER_TYPE
          value: console
        - name: LOGGER_LEVEL
          value: debug
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: staging
        - name: NODE_PATH
          value: app/src
        - name: MICROSERVICE_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MICROSERVICE_TOKEN
              name: mssecrets
        - name: GATEWAY_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GATEWAY_URL
              name: mssecrets
        - name: FASTLY_ENABLED
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: FASTLY_ENABLED
              name: mssecrets
        - name: FASTLY_APIKEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: FASTLY_APIKEY
              name: mssecrets
              optional: true
        - name: FASTLY_SERVICEID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: FASTLY_SERVICEID
              name: mssecrets
              optional: true
        - name: SALESFORCE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SALESFORCE_URL
              name: mssecrets
        - name: SALESFORCE_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SALESFORCE_USERNAME
              name: mssecrets
        - name: SALESFORCE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SALESFORCE_PASSWORD
              name: mssecrets
        image: gfwdockerhub/salesforce-connector:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthcheck
            port: 9500
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 15
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: salesforce-connector
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9500
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthcheck
            port: 9500
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 15
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '1'
            memory: 512M
          requests:
            cpu: 350m
            memory: 256M
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: systemize-user-api
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: systemize-user-api
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: systemize-user-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: systemize-user-api
        image: systemize-user-api:stable
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 3000
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
